desc: The local home of excellent, organic and local cafe meals. Right on the Snow Road, Milawa Providore is the perfect place to stop on your way to Hotham or Fall's Creek for a weekend away. There is outdoor dining, a marquee, fireplace during the winter and private dining rooms.

layout.text: Milawa Providore is a delightful cafe, providore and cellar door for Redbank Wines located in the heart of the Milawa Gourmet Region at the base of the King Valley.

.
.
Take a peek at the menu and give us a ring to place an order!
03 5727 3904 or 0427 228 482
